meanings.definition: Not able to be noticed or perceived.
meanings.sent1: The tiny bug was almost unnoticeable on the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The plain wall color was so unnoticeable that no one remembered it.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was making himself unnoticeable to the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her quiet presence in the room was as unnoticeable as a whisper in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The soft music played in the background, creating an unnoticeable ambiance.

meanings.sent1: The new painting was unnoticeable among the vibrant artworks.
meanings.sent2: His unnoticeable haircut made him blend in with the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The plain cake was so unnoticeable that no one wanted a slice.
meanings.sent4: Her unnoticeable perfume was like a faint memory from childhood.
meanings.sent5: The unnoticeable scent of fresh flowers filled the room subtly.
